divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving to work and as i was headed down 274 i seen a solid bright red light about the size of a lady bug, i travel 274 alot so i thought it was odd because i never seen that red light befor, but i didnt think much about it......as i kept driving east on 274 i noticed it was getting bigger,then not long after i notied that it turned direction to the north because i could see 3 light one being the red which was the one closes to me and directly across from the red was the solid blue light those 2 lights made the bottom of a triangle with one light in each cornor, at what would be the top of the triangle was the flashing white light.....this object was so close to me as i was stopped in the middle of 274 that i could see under neath it and it was clearly a solid blake triangle with just the 3 lights one on each point.....as i sat there looking up at it it kinda just glides through the sky headed in a north west direction making no noise how i know is because my window was down and my head was hanging out looking up at it.......i was kinda dumb founded at what i had just seen.....all i could do is text my husband and tell him what i had just seen knowing he was asleep.....my brain wasnt thinking normaland now i could kick myself in the butt for not taking a picture of it with my phone but like i said i was kinda dumb founded with the sighting
